speaker: narrator
dialog: You're studying the library when the seat next to you is pulled out and someone sits down.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Looking to your side you are surprised at the sight of Prince Yu who is now looking at your book.

speaker: yu
dialog: Wow you're making this assignment look easy, I'm having a tough time with it. Do you think you'd lend me your answers?

speaker: yu
dialog: I owe you one Taylor. I'll just copy them real quick.

speaker: yu
dialog: I wouldn't mind that! Let's get started then.

speaker: yu
dialog: A woman who has her priorities right. I can respect that!

speaker: narrator
dialog: Eventually the bell tolls signalling the end of break. Yu stands up and stretches.

speaker: yu
dialog: This was fun. I'll see you around Taylor

speaker: narrator
dialog: And with your que to leave you both head back to class.
